DataElement.preferredName: Patient Longest Duration Chief Complaint Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The longest duration or length of time in which the patient/participant experienced the presenting symptoms.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Having the greater length of two or the greatest length of several._The period of time during which something continues._The primary reason for a patient visit.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A mathematical element that when added to another number yields the same number; the cardinal number meaning one less than one.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: A natural number greater than twenty-nine and less than thirty-one and the quantity that it denotes.: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
